title: List data policies
description: Lists all data policies in a specified project and location. Use this to audit or manage existing data policies programmatically.

objective.narrative: A data administrator needs to programmatically retrieve a list of all data policies within a specific Google Cloud project and location for auditing, reporting, or bulk management tasks.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2beta1_datapolicyservice_datapolicies_list
